4319170.description:
Sun Wars – Galactic Strategy in Real Time

After 500,000+ downloads on Google Play, SunWars arrives on Steam!

Sun Wars is a real-time strategy game set in a cosmic battlefield where suns fight for dominance across the galaxy. Build your solar system, manage energy, and outsmart your enemies in an ever-evolving war between stars.

Create and upgrade suns to strengthen your solar system. Each sun generates energy, the core resource you’ll need to attack, defend, and expand. Managing your growth is the key to survival.

Strategic Combat Between Suns

Use your energy to attack enemy suns and destroy their solar systems before they destroy yours. Every decision matters: when to attack, when to defend, and when to grow stronger.

When a sun dies, it collapses into a dangerous black hole. These cosmic threats can change the battlefield, block paths, and force you to adapt your strategy on the fly.

Over 80 Unique Constellations

Fight across more than 80 handcrafted constellations, each with increasing difficulty. As you progress, you’ll face new challenges, new elements, and more complex strategic scenarios that test your skills.

Victory doesn’t belong to the fastest player, but to the smartest one. Clever tactics, careful energy management, and long-term planning are essential to win the galactic war.

Key Features

  • Real-time strategy focused on suns and energy management

  • More than 80 constellations with progressive difficulty

  • Dynamic black holes that alter the battlefieldm, magnetar, Einsten-Rosen portals...

  • Pure strategic gameplay: no luck, only decisions

  • Minimalist space visuals with clear tactical readability
